name: places/ChIJ2cGup5z2wokReSa3VQ9-PbI
adrFormatAddress: 3929 Broadway, New York, NY 10032, USA

editorialSummary.text: Optical store offering frames, contact lenses & eye exams, plus eyeglass repair & adjustment.

originalText.text: I’ve been a patient for 20+ years. Very professional and patient. I love the optometrist but beware of the Saturday doctors. First time ever did I not trust a doctor and we actually had a disagreement. But then There was an older gentleman attending on Saturday and he was so amazing and caring. I’m so sorry I can’t remember his name. It was a year ago just about and I’m getting forgetful lol any one who feels they can be serviced and treated better should always voice their opinion. But my interactions has always been great. Prices are decent too when you’re not covered with insurance.

originalText.text: THE BEST OF THE BEST! The entire staff was absolutely fantastic; from the doctors to the girls on the floor! They’re efficient very attentive and so professional! First time glasses wearer and let me tell you I left feeling like a million bucks with the glasses the girls helped me choose!! I highly recommend everyone to come and shoot them a visit even if it’s just for an eye exam! I promise you won’t regret it! Keep up the good work girls & the tech is amazing to say the least.

text.text: THE BEST OF THE BEST! The entire staff was absolutely fantastic; from the doctors to the girls on the floor! They’re efficient very attentive and so professional! originalText.text: Very disappointed with service rendered. I only buy my disposable contact from here bc my  friend runs this shop…so I come and order 12 pairs of contacts for a total of 380 bc I’m going on summer vacation. So she tells me I would get the order the next day…it’s been 2 days and nothing, the staff is very unprofessional and rude. Unfortunately my friend isn’t there on the wknds. I’ll be taking my business elsewhere next time.

originalText.text: I had a horrible experience with this place . I had called to make an appointment and told them what I wanted and asked if my insurance covered it on the phone. I was assured that I was covered . On the day of my appointment which I was on time for I waited 40 mins for them to tell me that someone made a mistake and that they didn’t take my insurance. When I inquired why it took so long for them to figure that out . I was met with smirks and  half apologies while one girl behind the counter was laughing at my frustration. I would never patron this establishment in life . Very unprofessional and clearly don’t care or respect their customers.

originalText.text: I’ve been a customer for years. I got my first pair of glasses here and Hanoi has been a doll for years, and so kind. But, today the first time I don’t see her here it was the worst experience I have event been through. I called Friday asking if they had an appointment for today Saturday. The young lady said unfortunately no but would check her appointment list, magically a 2:00pm slot opened up. I run late today called asked if they will still take me the lady on the phone says yes to still come in, I show up, walk in with 2 other people she skips me over attends to one of the two gentlemen and tells me to wait and after she is done with him does not even acknowledge me and proceeds to have a conversation. The other young lady there also does not look my way and attends to the other person there. I ask another girl behind the counter I have an appointment that I understand I was late for, do I need to sign in. She asked the first girl that ignored me about me and she asks me if I’m being taken care, I responded no you looked over me and took him. This girl asks for my name to check her appointment book and to my surprise my name was never written down and the Optometrists went on to take another person who obviously was on time. The girl let’s the other know I’m not there and she says it’s fine to write me down next, knowing there are others before me without telling me what time I’ll be seen. I asked for Hanoi who only works weekdays & just proceeded to walk out. This experience left a sour taste in my mouth and sadly looks like I would have to take my business elsewhere. Sucks to know that they’re willing to lose a self paying customer, who not only pays for the exam, brand glasses and contacts at that. Management definitely downgraded on the amazing team they once had.
